title: Having succinct thoughts
excerpt: …is a great skill to have if you’re a writer, a teacher or an (aspiring) leader.

children.text: …is a great skill to have if you’re a writer, a teacher or an (aspiring) leader.
It’s what we ought to focus on when hiring anyone for any kind of job that requires the utilization of knowledge over pure labor.
And it’s exactly what you should practice doing today.
